archiveDescription: Tēnei mea te pūranga. He wāhi auaha hei pupuri, hei tiki, ā, hei uru hoki ki ōu nei pūrākau
storyDescription: Ko te Pakiwaitara/Pūrākau, he kōrero matihiko e hiranga ana ki tētahi, ki tētahi hapori rānei. Inarā he kōrero whakapapa, he kōrero ahurea rānei. Ko ēnei he kōrero pēnei i ngā maharatanga, he hītori, he pūrākau, he takamahi, he pakaiwaitara rānei.
archiveTypes: E rua ngā momo pūranga ki roto i Āhau
personalArchive: Ko tāu pūranga ake, kua muna katoatia, ā, kua whakamuna hoki ki tāu ake taputapu hangarau. Kia whakaritea tāu pūkete, ka whakaritea hoki tāu pūranga
whanauArchive: Kohinga Mahara: He pūranga kua whakamunatia. E āhei ana te hunga e whakaae anake kia uru. Ko ērā whanaunga e whakaae anake kia uru. Kia hangaia he iwi hou. ka hangaia hoki he kohinga Hapori
createRecord: Kia whakaritea he pūranga. Nāu anō te mana kia kōwhirihia ko tēwhea te rua mahara ka noho ai tāu pūranga mā te tini i te mana uru ki a koe, ko tētahi rōpū e noho ana koe.
itemsStories: Rau atu ngā pūrākau mai i ngā pūranga ki te kohinga nei
itemsArtefacts: Tāpirihia ngā taonga me ngā pāpāho ki ngā kōrero
itemsViewAll: Tirohia ō kōrero katoa i te wāhi kotahi
itemsIndividual: Tirohia ngā kōrero takitahi mō ētahi atu kōrero
